name: Voxel Destruction_Basic
description:
The idea of this project is everything in the world is destructible

there are bugs this is just a prototype

Future updates: There can be an introduction of Job system and ECS in this demo

This is just me testing the basic version of Voxels destruction, I was Inspired from

"Teardown" indie game 

Controls

W,A,S,D 

Mouse Look 

Mouse Left Click to Shoot Projectile 

R to restart the Simulation
